text:
3 things we can all do to make sure we reach the June 21 deadline:

✅ Follow the #rules 
✅ Get tested for #COVID19 
✅ Get the #vaccine

Let’s work together to get back to doing the things we enjoy.

We have a real chance to come out of #lockdown safely, let's keep going! https://t.co/LB5iof4I2g
